member.name: T:Alternet.Scripter.Debugger.Python.ScriptDebugger.TraceEvents
member.summary: See https://docs.python.org/2/library/sys.html#sys.settrace

member.name: F:Alternet.Scripter.Debugger.Python.ScriptDebugger.TraceEvents.Call
member.summary: A function is called (or some other code block entered). The global trace function is called; arg is None; the return value specifies the local trace function.

member.name: F:Alternet.Scripter.Debugger.Python.ScriptDebugger.TraceEvents.Line
member.summary: The interpreter is about to execute a new line of code or re-execute the condition of a loop. The local trace function is called; arg is None; the return value specifies the new local trace function. See Objects/lnotab_notes.txt for a detailed explanation of how this works.

member.name: F:Alternet.Scripter.Debugger.Python.ScriptDebugger.TraceEvents.Return
member.summary: A function (or other code block) is about to return. The local trace function is called; arg is the value that will be returned, or None if the event is caused by an exception being raised. The trace functionï¿½s return value is ignored.

member.name: F:Alternet.Scripter.Debugger.Python.ScriptDebugger.TraceEvents.Exception
member.summary: An exception has occurred. The local trace function is called; arg is a tuple (exception, value, traceback); the return value specifies the new local trace function.

member.name: T:Alternet.Scripter.Debugger.Python.IScriptDebugger
member.summary: Provides methods and properties that allow developers to debug applications in the common language runtime (CLR) environment.

member.summary: When implemented by a class, contains all information required to compile and run the script
